post.body: hahaha thats an amazing tweet, thank god i didn't have to worry about getting myself home. heart prius car service
3 words for you: is it naptime?
high five for ordering brunch, amazing
not only did you get smartwater, you got enough to quench the thirst of the world lol
i tried to make a scarf once...i gave up really quickly - it could be a mouses scarf. knitting is hard!
to be a proper twitterer... i'm mentally getting ready for bite's holiday party! hooray
p.s. i think its nice to twitter with you as you sit...10 feet away haha
that feels...how do you say...sarcastic
you're always one step ahead...
what if somebody new comes in and says...let's make it rain bioootch!
i miss all the good stuff....although after drinks with diane i did have a cupcake haha
i must say she's wonderfully adorable, and i think we really bonded over coloring and cupcakes haha. bring her back soon!
haha i fully approve of the drinking in preparation for the debate. they call that being on your game
how did the palin drinking game shape up?
yea, um working in my pajamas...aka amazing
hey remember that time is was hailing - and you wore my girls grey hat with the bow? that was fun
two holiday parties...seems a bit greedy
wow you got served...target style!
purple sweaters...that's where it's at
lunch break aka shopping break
lisa hannigan, give her a listen... http://www.myspace.com/lisahannigan
joe purdy - loving it. way to be mcmatt. spreading the joy...and the terror
working from home! woohoo
listening to the black keys... it's a good thing
